ValidationRule.description: If Vendor Outage is TRUE then Outage Duration and Description must be populated
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Vendor_Outage__c, 'Yes'), OR( ISBLANK( Vendor_Outage_Description__c ), ISBLANK( Outage_Duration__c ) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Vendor Outage is YES then please populate a value for Vendor Outage Duration and Vendor Outage Description.
